attributes.action: Fine stupid shopkeepers for displaying "No Dogs allowed (Except guide dogs)" signs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The person with the guide dog isn't going to be able to read this sign, so who else is this intended for when they say "Except guide dogs". Can guide dogs read now? Impose a heavy fine on stupid shopkeepers who put these signs up

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
